short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save quotes from all over the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotemark lets you save quotes from the internet and bookmark them. A list of quotes is saved in the extension's popup. Clicking on the quote, brings you back to the original web-page, where the quote is highlighted and in focus.
